1.0.name: wordpress/restrict-content-pro-download-monitor
1.0.description:
Limit Download Monitor file downloads to paid subscribers in Restrict Content Pro. This extension does NOT function without Download Monitor AND Restrict Content Pro installed.

This extension has no options and will automatically restrict all member-only file downloads to paid subscribers.

If a file is not set to Member Only, it will not require an active subscription.

Learn more about Restrict Content Pro: http://pippinsplugins.com/restrict-content-pro-premium-content-plugin/
